paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on Moroccan prostate cancer patients.

patients.phenotype: High grade prostatic adenocarcinoma (grade IV), larger tumor size (≥ T2) and distant metastasis

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The second mutation was a small insertion detected in exon 14 of BRCA2 gene (c.7234_7235insG (7463insG)) inducing a shift in the reading frame.

functional_data.summary: Induces a shift in the reading frame leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: All three pathogenic mutations were found in patients with a strong family history of PrCa.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on family history and mutation type.
variants.additional_notes: This mutation has been previously found in several breast/ovarian cancer families.
key_quotes: The second mutation was a small insertion detected in exon 14 of BRCA2 gene (c.7234_7235insG (7463insG)) inducing a shift in the reading frame.

patients.phenotype: High grade prostatic adenocarcinoma (grade IV), larger tumor size (≥ T2) and distant metastasis

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Finally, a whole-exon 12 deletion (BRCA2ΔE12) have been identified in BRCA2 gene.

functional_data.summary: Deletion of entire exon 12, potentially affecting protein function.

variants.segregation_data: Detected in two unrelated PrCa patients.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on family history and mutation type.
variants.additional_notes: This mutation is an in-frame deletion that should result in the production of a 32 amino acid shortened protein.
key_quotes: Finally, a whole-exon 12 deletion (BRCA2ΔE12) have been identified in BRCA2 gene.

tables_processed.table_caption: Pathogenic mutations detected in BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
